# mAudioFile

**Instance Property**

Must be a valid and already-open audio file object (of type `AudioFileID`), as declared in `AudioToolbox/AudioFile.h`.

## Declaration

```swift
var mAudioFile: OpaquePointer
```
title: mAudioFile
